custom-meta.meta-value: The raw data were collected as part of a survey involving human beings, and its use is restricted by the data use policies of the Institutional Ethics Committee on Research with Human Beings of the University of Québec à Montreal. The processed data files that have been used for this study, and which do not allow individual identification of the participants, are available from the Figshare repository ( https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.6260444.v2).
